title: Enhancing Data Science Practical Competencies: Technology-Integrated Instructional Design for Strengthening English as a Second Language (ESL) Assessment Capabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational English teaching methodologies and basic digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Apply second language assessment theories and technology integration models (TAM, TPACK, etc.) to actual classroom contexts

Using LMS-based formative assessment tools (Moodle/Google Classroom, etc.), learners design a feedback system tailored to 3+ learner types (e.g., beginner/intermediate/advanced) and achieve a suitability score of 80%+ in peer evaluations and expert reviews
Develop and implement blended assessment strategies utilizing digital portfolios/quiz platforms
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
